snippet: The South Bronx Culture Trail, funded by an $80,000 grant from the New York Community Trust, will create a self-guided tour of the neighborhood’s cultural history.
abstract: Walking tour South Bronx Culture Trail, sponsored by cultural institution Casita Maria in conjunction with local community organizations and leaders, is out to unearth the deep musical and cultural history of the area; funded by an $80,000 grant from the New York Community Trust, project will install series of 10 permanent markers in 2015, creating a self-guided tour of the South Bronx.
lead_paragraph: The South Bronx Culture Trail, funded by an $80,000 grant from the New York Community Trust, will create a self-guided tour of the neighborhood’s cultural history.

headline.main: With South Bronx Trail, a History and a Culture Will Be Clearly Marked
headline.print_headline: On South Bronx Trail, History and Culture Will Be Clearly Marked
